subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Joe Paterno, the 81-year-old entering his 43rd season as the coach at Penn State, will be enshrined with 19 others into the College Football Hall of Fame on Saturday night.
snippet: Joe Paterno, the 81-year-old entering his 43rd season as the coach at Penn State, will be enshrined with 19 others into the College Football Hall of Fame on Saturday night.
